column4: I tried to put terminal in the launcher since I use it so much, it didn't have an icon and I didn't like that it didn't show when in use anymore, so I removed it from the launch now it doesn't appear there anymore at all so if I minimize the terminal I can't close it
I am on the latest ubuntu version that is running unity
gnome terminal does have an icon, you can also just press 'Control+Alt+T'  to open a terminal
you can reset unity setings: unity --reset
